TopicTitle: [Heavy WIP] [Help Wanted] MK35 Fuselage Expansion- Stealth Fighter Parts- Modelling Thread

Articles.Content:
I'm working on a new fuselage mod that expands Mk2 with a new profile-- MK35! MK35 is a fuselage extension based around the F-22 Raptor and F-35 Lightning II's stealth profiles and bays. 

So far, I have a few models, shown below, and a basic fuselage shape, which is in Unity. What I'm looking for is someone else to help me with texturing and modeling. 

The models will likely need a major rework as they aren't really all that stealthy. This will be fixed in the future, and the Radar Cross Section will be dramatically lessened.

Testers aren't needed yet, but any input is welcome!

 

Thanks, and any help is appreciated!

Edited September 28, 2017 by njmksr

Is this rocket in the first screen for reference only? Cause it's a bit heavy on polygons for a small object, I think.

Otherwise, looks promising.
However, I'd check if there are already any F-22 Raptor or F-35 Lightning mods available. It may happen that someone beat you to it, that is, if you care...
